property.name: chart.dark
property.description:
Color of the darkened (ie unlit) lights
Default: #eee

property.name: chart.background
property.description:
The color of the background.
Default: white

property.name: chart.zoom.mode
property.description:
Can be used to control whether the zoom is in thumbnail or canvas mode. Possible values are: thumbnail and canvas.
Default: canvas

property.name: chart.zoom.factor
property.description:
This is the factor that the graph will be zoomed by (bigger values means more zoom)
Default: 1.5

property.name: chart.zoom.fade.in
property.description:
Whether the zoomed canvas fades in or not. This also can be used to control the fade in for the zoom in thumbnail mode.
Default: true

property.name: chart.zoom.fade.out
property.description:
Whether the zoomed canvas fades out or not. This also can be used to control the fade in for the zoom in thumbnail mode.
Default: true

property.name: chart.zoom.hdir
property.description:
The horizontal direction of the zoom. Possible values are: left, center, right
Default: right

property.name: chart.zoom.vdir
property.description:
The vertical direction of the zoom. Possible values are: up, center, down
Default: down

property.name: chart.zoom.delay
property.description:
The delay (in milliseconds) between frames.
Default: 50

property.name: chart.zoom.frames
property.description:
The number of frames in the zoom animation.
Default: 10

property.name: chart.zoom.shadow
property.description:
Whether or not the zoomed canvas has a shadow or not.
Default: true

property.name: chart.zoom.thumbnail.width
property.description:
When the zoom is in thumbnail mode, this is the width (in pixels) of the thumbnail.
Default: 75

property.name: chart.zoom.thumbnail.height
property.description:
When the zoom is in thumbnail mode, this is the height (in pixels) of the thumbnail.
Default: 75

property.name: chart.zoom.background
property.description:
Defaulting to true, this determines whether the zoom has a dark, semi-opaque background that covers the entire web page.
Default: true
